document_data.mainbody:
enokanburi was a town and fortress in the Kuong Kingdom in Malatra. It stood where the Srelanat Road met the Kunong River.
A river port town, Denokanburi was where gems and precious metals mined around the kingdom were transferred to the capital city, Ranguri. A good deal of official business was done here in the midâ€“14 century DR.
So too was a good deal of illegal business. The local jinyan engaged in smuggling and protection rackets and the Yalaj family dominated the town.
